resources.string: This application reads and writes NDEF messages from/to a NFC tag.

There are 3 icons to click on:
1 home = this page
2 read NDEF message
3 write an NDEF message
This app reads a NDEF message
This example expects a class 4 type tag with an NDEF record (RTD_TEXT).\n\nWhen a tag is discovered the data from all records will be read.
This example writes a NDEF record (RTD_TEXT) and message to a NTAG 216 tag
